column4: Is there an easy way for me to tell if I have the proprietary or open ATI drivers installed? I cant remember what I used when I set this thing up.
look in the /etc/X11/xorg.conf file for the 'Driver" line
I remember it because I use `invoke-rc.d ` to stop and start services

theres a better way to change the default shell from dash to bash.
i think its 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure bash' (or was it sh, or dash)
Thats probably a better route then
